a0.speaker: Reimu:
a0.dialogue: The symbols look quite familiar... could the culprit be...

a1.speaker: Raiko:
a1.dialogue: It is I who descended upon this land to bring the bliss from heaven to this otherwise gloomy land.

a2.speaker: Raiko:
a2.dialogue: People often call me by the name 'the Narukami Ouki'...

a3.speaker: Raiko:
a3.dialogue: But I also go by names such as 'Primordial Storm', 'Angel of Thunder', 'Matriarch of Horikawa', and so on.

a4.speaker: Reimu:
a4.dialogue: Aha! So, you are the same drum tsukumogami who was born from a certain incident a while ago!

a5.speaker: Reimu:
a5.dialogue: But I feel something unusual with her today. What if...

a6.speaker: Raiko:
a6.dialogue: Be not afraid, young lady. I was born into and raised in the prestigious Church-backed House Horikawa.

a7.speaker: Raiko:
a7.dialogue: It shouldn't be a surprise if you see me praying backstage or seeing crosses on my stage.

a8.speaker: Raiko:
a8.dialogue: This outfit correctly conveys my status as a mighty angel of Thunder as well as the Harbinger of Joy and Hope.

a9.speaker: Reimu:
a9.dialogue: I know it! You are not the Raiko I met!

a10.speaker: Reimu:
a10.dialogue: You are a heretical impostor disguising as her, hiding among us!

a11.speaker: Reimu:
a11.dialogue: I won't let you steal my followers and bless them with your Father's heretical teaching!

a12.speaker: Reimu:
a12.dialogue: 'But to deliver us from evil'? Hmph, that won't happen in Gensokyo, you donkey.

a13.speaker: Raiko:
a13.dialogue: O Lord and Saint Peter, please help me. I will neither forgive gimmick nor trick.

a14.speaker: Raiko:
a14.dialogue: The Scarlet Devil's scepter is trying to snatch away your lambs, including me and those who love me.

a15.speaker: Raiko:
a15.dialogue: Please, O the Lord of Hosts, help me vanquish the forces of evil of the Netherworld in an instant!

a16.speaker: Reimu:
a16.dialogue: Why are you standing there chanting heretical words? You think you are actually the one in help, huh?

a17.speaker: Reimu:
a17.dialogue: You are the one who caused trouble to the people of Gensokyo, you know.

a18.speaker: Raiko:
a18.dialogue: Ah ha ha... Well then, I must say that those who live by the sword will die by the sword!

a19.speaker: Raiko:
a19.dialogue: Prepare to be dragged down to Hades due to your deed, the Handmaid of the Scarlet Devil!

a20.speaker: Raiko:
a20.dialogue: My songs shall sing for the triumph of my eternal crusade against the dirty acts of your sinful culture.

a21.speaker: Raiko:
a21.dialogue: My thunder shall be the herald of the woes you will suffer!
